title: For some reason I've seem to have lost my pbe account.
body:
I had a Public Beta Environment account that i got at least 2 yrs ago that i tried to get back to tonight and couldn't. I went through the trouble of password resetting and it seems it's not recognizing my username at all.
I know i had one, could some one help me with this issue?

replies.body: It doesn't look like your PBE account was locked permanently, but it did have some suspicious activity going on. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking "I need help recovering my account" and after verifying yourself as the creator we should be able to activate your PBE again.

I already have done that, and i definitely wasn't doing anything suspicious. A month or so ago, my password changed by itself in the regular client, and I did not notify anybody about it. Just changed it instead. Maybe that's what you are reffering to. My account may have been hacked at one point
